name: Ichimaru
description: {{nihongo|'''Ichimaru'''|市丸}}, born {{nihongo|'''Matsue Goto'''|後藤 まつゑ|Gotō Matsue|July 16, 1906 – February 17, 1997}}, was a popular Japanese recording artist and [[geisha]]. Her rivalry with another popular geisha singer, {{lang|ja-Latn|[[Katsutaro Kouta]]|italic=no}}, created the "{{lang|ja-Latn|Katsu-Ichi|italic=no}} Era" in Japanese music history.
